name: Absence Makes The Music Faster
description:
Our long-awaited second album is finally here!

Released through End Note Records in the UK and Fond Of Life Productions across the rest of Europe it is quite simply the best stuff we've produced so far.
We're massively proud of it and we really hope you love it as much as us.

The album comes in a beautifully finished Digipak with custom artwork by our very own Karlos.

Featuring a special version of "See This Through" unavailable anywhere else.

So to quote 'Help, My Kidneys are on Fire!' from our first album... "What are you waiting for?!"

Track Listing:

1.   This Time
2.   The Wrestlers
3.   Family
4.   Hit For Six
5.   Four Of Us
6.   Sour Grapes
7.   Keep Me With You
8.   50 Cent
9.   Lean Back On Me
10. See This Through
11. Justify
12. The Finish Line

name: I'm Not Asking, I'm Telling!
description:
Back in 2005 we self-released our debut album to some pretty decent reviews from the press. It's 10 tracks of fist-pumping sing along punk rock and if you don't already have it you should pick up a copy!

The CD also contains special interactive content with a music player, video and a little surprise if you can find it! (Note, this portion of the CD was created long before Macs became trendy so it only works on Windows - the music will play fine on all computers though).

Track Listing:

1.   Help, My Kidneys Are On Fire!
2.   Reputation
3.   Jackie
4.   Alison's War
5.   Father Jack
6.   Lesson 47
7.   Campaign For The Liberation Of The Federation Of Plimsoles
8.   Shaznay!
9.   Young, Dumb & Full Of Cum
10. Wank On Your Idols

"The song names on this album indicate a piss taking joke band, but that notion is put to rest after the first song. ‘Help, my kidneys are on fire’ is a fierce blistering tune, its solid, loud, tight with fantastic riffs and all out pace, most often its hard to get this sound while sounding punk but Dirty Kirst pull it off effortlessly." - PunkNews

"Given how many bands attempt this slick, fast, tight and tuneful Punk, it's a testament to these 4-fellas that they make it sound so fresh, invigorating and exciting." - Scannerzine
